description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity class for an Android app using Jetpack Compose. It sets up navigation between different composable screens, manages view models, and handles UI state transitions for a note-taking app.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity that initializes the app's UI, sets up navigation, and manages view models for different screens.
